modName: Make Anyone a Follower - Including Children - Full vanilla dialogue menus
summary: Removes the VoicesFollowersNeutral form list prerequisite for followers. Full vanilla dialogue menus for everyone, including children.
descriptionHtml:
I wouldn\'t be surprised if this has been done before, but I couldn\'t find it anywhere when I needed it, so here it is for convenience.

I just removed the prerequisites that restrict follower dialogue to a select few NPC voices. This should allow you to set any NPC as a follower through console commands, or the included batch file.

Install/Use:
1. Download with NMM or extract
2. Check VoicesFollowerNeutral.esp in your mod manager or data files
3. Open the console and select the NPC you want as a follower
4. Type \"bat follower\"

Characters with voices that aren\'t on the restricted form list will obviously be partially or entirely unvoiced, but other than that I haven\\\'t found any downsides or conflicts. Works with most NPCs from other mods as well.

follower.txt modified from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13120
author: asdf
